text: Hi all, I am working on the development of a page and I have to build a template to publish it, but I am a little bit confused because it is not clear in the tutorials I watched how to build it. I add the code of the page but it doesn't display anything. Should I have to use "dnd_area"?
Could you suggest any documentations or source where I can find the right informations, please?

Hello !
I try to display the number of tag post .
My code is this :

 `{% set my_tags = blog_topics('default') %}`
                                  `{% if my_tags %}`
                                    `<div class="blog-post__tags">`
                                      `{% for topic in my_tags %}`
                                        `<a class="blog-post__tag-link" href="{{ blog_tag_url(group.id, topic.slug) }}">{{ topic.name }} ( {{ my_tags.topic_list|length }} )</a>`
                                      `{% endfor %}`
                                    `</div>`
                                  `{% endif %}`

Can anyone help me with this ?
